page.title: 02Population in The Shelsleys
page.content: The population of the block is 354, consisting of 57% working age, 17% retired and 26% school age. There are two main concentrations of population: along the Martley Hillside road, 75.61, and the bungalows in Shelsley Beauchamp, 73.63. Nearly all the houses including the bungalows are owner-occupied. Of the 202 people of working age 15% are self-employed; activities range from computer services, plastering and mechanics to odd jobs, while 15% work on the land and 5.4% are unemployed. Worcester provides more jobs than any other town (8%) but people travel to Bromsgrove, Birmingham, Stourbridge, and Wolverhampton among others.
